text: aldhyn yataeamalun balrba -whw alziyadat ealaa ras almal- la yaqumun fi alakhirat min qbwrhm 'iilaa kama yaqum aladhi yatakhabatuh alshaytan min aljnwn; dhlk li'anahum qalu: 'iinama albaye mithl alrba, fi 'an kla minhuma hlal, wayuadiy 'iilaa ziadat almal, fakdhbhm allh, wbyan 'anah 'uhila albaye whrram alrba; lamaa fi albaye walshira' min nfe lil'afrad waljmaeat, walamaa fi alriba min aistighlal wadayae whlak. faman blghh nhy allah ean alriba fartde, falah ma madaa qabl 'an yblghh althrym la 'iithm ealayh fyh, wa'amruh 'iilaa allah fima yastaqbil min zmanh, fa'iina astmrr ealaa twbth fallah la yudie 'ajr almhsnyn, waman ead 'iilaa alriba ffelh baed blwghh nhy allah enh, faqad astwjb aleqwbt, waqamat ealayh alhjt, wlhdha qal sbhanh: (fa'uwlayik 'ashab alnnar hum fiha khaliduna)
